messages.message: Hey there, welcome to our group! I saw you were also studying at UofT, what year are you in?

keywords.returnMessage: What type of food are you looking for?
Yeah, it gets pretty chilly here in the TDot. You defintiely need to get yourself toque and mack at some point!
There's a few places you could go shopping like the Eatons Centre, but you should check out the Shopping Groups because there are some great shops all over Toronto.
There are several cinemas in the area. Some examples are Cineplex Cinemas Varisty and VIP, Cineplex Cinemas Yonge-Dundas and VIP and Imagine Cinemas Carlton.

That is great to hear! If you search basketball on the homepage of the application, it should give you a list of events and groups associated with Fantasy Basketball Groups, Pickup Basketball Events and more.
